snippet: A case over patents to mitigate risks among multiple parties in a transaction has been seen as an indicator of how abstract technical ideas can be to become eligible for patent protection.
abstract: Supreme Court, in case with potential to reshape software industry, seems poised to issue fresh limits on patents for computer-based business methods; though case originated far from Silicon Valley, it has been closely watched as indicator of how specific or abstract technical ideas can be to become eligible for patent protection; software patents in question are owned by Alice Corporation.
lead_paragraph: A case over patents to mitigate risks among multiple parties in a transaction has been seen as an indicator of how abstract technical ideas can be to become eligible for patent protection.

headline.main: Justices Seem Wary of Software Patent Case
headline.print_headline: Justices Seem Wary of Software Patent Case
